paragraph.paragraph: This document lists the changes, including additions and enhancements, made between Eiffel ENViSioN! 2.01 and EiffelEnvision 2.5.
paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Project System:

list.item: Completely revised url *Solution Explorer that includes the addition of a Eiffel Project Items and Eiffel Libraries node.
Precompiled library assemblies and runtime assemblies are shown under the References node.
COM references correctly use a Primary Interop Assembly (PIA) when available.
All component references are updated in real-time. Any modifications to the project properties or changes in a project references are reflected automatically.
Setting a prefix for a component reference will no longer force a rebuild as long as the assembly has not yet been compiled.
The Other Project Items node now allows creation of folder hierarchies.
All Solution Explorer items have context menus.
Updated automation model to be read/write and added support for all new Solution Explorer items and folders.
Use of environment variables permitted in solution item properties with paths.
Resolved conflicting use of the ISE_EIFFEL environment variable.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision New Projects and New Project Items:

list.item: Added concept of application project items.

The Eiffel Graphical Application project does not show the EiffelVision2 graphical builder in the wizard any more. The builder is launched after a project has been compiled. See url *EiffelBuild for version history.
Removed HTML Report project due to integration with Project System.
Post creation of new project, a build is performed displaying all build related output to the user.
Adding new project items automatically adds all dependent clusters, assembles and changes the precompile library if deemed necessary.
All new projects create a user-configurable app.config file.
Moved all unmanaged resource files to a "resources" project folder.
app.rc files in the resources are taken as the project's unmanaged resource file.
Added a blank Eiffel class item to the list of Solution Items.
Added application configuration new project item.
A new known "resource" folder has been added to contain all unmanaged resources and permit editing of .rc files from a project.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Project Configuration:

list.item: Abstracted many project configurable items common to all configurations.
Removed cluster project property configuration page due to cluster integration with Solution Explorer.
All properties that require a project to be rebuilt from scratch now indicate this in their description.
Added more project related properties to finer grain control compilation.
Removed Support CLR Version property as it is redundant because EiffelEnvision allows compilation to target a version of the CLR.
The active configuration can now be renamed through the configuration manager.
Removed project configuration dependency on Eiffel compiler configuration (*.ace) files. All configuration details are stored in an EiffelEnvision project file (*.eifp).
Use of environment variables permitted in properties with paths.
Active project and solution configurations may not be renamed or remove without switching the active configuration.

paragraph.heading: 2 Eiffel Editor:

list.item: Added sorted tracking feature dropdown list that contains all class features.
Source code now has automatic and manual source code outlining.
Go to Definition has been greatly improved and provides better naviagation results.
Go to Definition works in create and convert clauses.
Synchronize Class View has been added to the editor context menu allow caret position syncrosization with Class View.
Removed Go to Declaration context menu item as it has become redundant and was confusing to many.
Adjusted default syntax highlighting to better match and improve readability with EiffelStudio's default syntax highlighting color scheme.
Syntax highlight color scheme is now completely configurable.
Added completion for create and convert clauses.
Fixed syntax error bug when no feature clause is present in class text.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Object Browser:

list.item: Better formatting for descriptions of .NET and Eiffel types and features.
Formatted .NET types and method names in trees to match those produced by Visual Studio .NET.
Added linking for .NET namespaces, .NET types, .NET features, and clusters.
Searching no longer keeps the Eiffel compiler loaded.
Resolved locking of active configuration's EIFGEN folder when searching.
Added ability to search using Match Case, Match Whole Word and Match Prefix and not just Match Substring.
Consumed Eiffel assembly type have project defined prefixes added to them.
Consumed Eiffel assembly type contructors are now in the list of available features.
Removed disambiguated Eiffel feature names under .NET Method as this is covered better in the description.
Added obsolete messages to relevant description.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Compiler:

list.item: Revised and cleaned up project build output by sectioning related build steps into Pre/Main/Post build.
Consuming metadata for assemblies is done prior to compiling the Eiffel code for better user progress status reporting.

Added compile-time optimizations removing project component references and clusters from the Eiffel compilation given that they are in a precompile library and match the configuration in that library.
Added additional optimization to compile in the most common Microsoft assemblies into the Eiffel precompiled libraries to prevent compilation of common classes (this is an install-time option).
Precompiled libraries can optionally be optimized to excluded assertions.
Projects are only compiled and are compiled on as-needed basis.
Eiffel compiler ace files are 100% generated and only generated when the project properties change.
Compilation does not require user to save the project.

paragraph.heading: 2 Eiffel Compiler:

list.item: Generates better and consistent .NET type and feature names. See url *Eiffel Type and Feature Name Formatting .
NATIVE_ARRAY permits use of expanded types.
.NET System.Real and System.Double constants are imported, at compiled-time, and expressed correctly at run-time.
For all other improvements see url *Eiffel Compiler Version History .

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Expression Evaluator:

list.item: Formatted all types names in Type column to show difference between Eiffel and .NET type.
Arrays show length as content value.
Void symbols show just Void.

paragraph.heading: 2 EiffelEnvision Project Deployment:

list.item: Precompiled Library projects can be deployed.
Added Source Files and Content Files to the list of deployable project items.
Added redistributable merge module for Eiffel framework assemblies.
Added redistributable merge module for EiffelSoftware.Runtime.dll.

paragraph.heading: 2 Miscellanous:

list.item: Fragmented EBCL into a series of Eiffel framework assemblies.
Included more of Eiffel Software and Third Party Eiffel libraries (includes gobo, lex, net, parse, store, thread and time).
No Eiffel Software assemblies are present in the Global Assembly Cache (GAC).
At install-time EiffelEnvision can be merged with EiffelStudio 5.5.
Changed product name from Eiffel ENViSioN! to EiffelEnvision.
